Class BasicPolygonShape

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.model.impl.BasicPolygonShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
PolygonShape, Shape, Serializable
public class BasicPolygonShape extends Object implements PolygonShape, Serializable
A basic implementation of the PolygonShape interface. Represents a polygon defined by a set of points.

This class is serializable to allow persistence.

See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • BasicPolygonShape

      public BasicPolygonShape(int cx, int cy, int numberOfSides, int diameter)
      Constructs a BasicPolygonShape with a regular polygon's vertices.
      Parameters:
      cx - The x-coordinate of the polygon's center.
      cy - The y-coordinate of the polygon's center.
      numberOfSides - The number of sides of the polygon.
      diameter - The diameter of the polygon.

      Constructs a BasicPolygonShape with the specified set of points.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • generatePolygonVertices

      public static LinkedHashSet<Point> generatePolygonVertices(int cx, int cy, int numberOfSides, int diameter)
      Generates the vertices of a regular polygon.
      Parameters:
      cx - The x-coordinate of the polygon's center.
      cy - The y-coordinate of the polygon's center.
      numberOfSides - The number of sides of the polygon.
      diameter - The diameter of the polygon.
      Returns:
      A LinkedHashSet of Point objects representing the vertices.
